 <https://go.freightforwarding.dhl.com/l/1024731/2023-12-04/prnm/1024731/1701746083rWU4w8uU/Email_Header_AU_Industry_Alerts__5_.png> 

 

Customer Notification

27 January 2025 - United Arab Emirates 

Air Security Check Fee in Europe effective February 1st, 2025

__________________

Dear Customer,

We are committed to ensuring the safety and security of all shipments entrusted to our care. In line with our dedication to compliance and operational excellence, we would like to inform you about the introduction of the Air Security Check Fee.

 

This measure is being implemented in adherence to strict air safety regulations including EU Regulation 2015/1998, which outlines stringent security requirements for airfreight transportation.

chunks.text:
This measure is being implemented in adherence to strict air safety regulations including EU Regulation 2015/1998, which outlines stringent security requirements for airfreight transportation. Effective from February 01st 2025, a fee of €4.80 per export shipment will apply to cover the additional costs associated with these mandated safety protocols and will be transparently itemized on your invoice.

 

The introduction of this fee reflects the growing complexity and rigor of airfreight security measures, including:

 

• Enhanced documentation and packaging condition check procedures to ensure the safe transportation of goods.

• Investments in material, facility infrastructures, advanced technology  

  and trained personnel. 

          • Increased administrative efforts to meet comprehensive safety checks, 

             documentation requirements and varying country specific regulations.

 

We want to assure you that this fee is essential to maintaining the highest standards of security and efficiency in our operations. The safety of your shipments and the global supply chain remains our top priority.

 

We appreciate your understanding and support as we implement this important measure. Should you have any questions or require further clarification, please do not hesitate to contact your local sales representative.  

 

__________________

Best regards,
DHL Logistics LLC Management - UAE

	
DHL Global Forwarding ― The Freight Forwarding Experts. Since 1815.

 <https://dhlsales360.cdn.salesforce-experience.com/cms/delivery/media/MCIEHK7ML5RJDYHNUQJPOVWKKX7A?oid=00D09000007jrvMEAQ&channelId=0ap5q000000XZAbAAO>
